decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: EX - L001 (Existing Location Plan, OS Map); EX - E001 (Existing Front Rear Elevations); EX - E002 (Existing Side Elevation); EX - S001 (Existing Section AA and BB); EX - P001 (Existing Ground Floor); EX - P002 (Existing First Floor); EX - P003 (Existing Loft Plan); EX - P004 (Existing Roof Plan); EX - 3D (Existing 3D); EX - 3D02 (Existing 3D Views); PR - E001 Rev D (Proposed Front Rear Elevations); PR - E002 Rev D (Proposed Side Elevation); PR - S001 Rev D (Proposed Section AA and BB); PR - P001 Rev D (Proposed Ground Floor); PR - P002 Rev D (Proposed First Floor); PR - P003 Rev D (Proposed Loft Plan); PR - P004 Rev D (Proposed Roof Plan); PR - 3D Rev D (Proposed 3D).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).
| No part of the flat roof of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).
description: Two storey side and single storey rear (wrap around) extension
